body:
Hello all, I am very new to Grasshopper/LB/HB but have some experience using OpenStudio and EnergyPlus. I am also in the process of working on my masters and would like to gear my research towards this software. Anyone have any good starting points on a research topic?

This may be a bit vague, but my program (for better or worse) is pretty open to letting students develop their own research topics, so far as it meets the professors expectations and is related to building energy efficiency.
